# alicloud\_express\_connect\_grant\_rule\_to\_cen

Provides a Express Connect Grant Rule To Cen resource.

For information about Express Connect Grant Rule To Cen and how to use it, see [What is Grant Rule To Cen](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/virtual-private-cloud/latest/grantinstancetocen).

-> **NOTE:** Available in v1.196.0+.

## Example Usage

Basic Usage

```python
import constructs as constructs
import cdktf as cdktf
# Provider bindings are generated by running cdktf get.
# See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
import ...gen.providers.alicloud as alicloud
class MyConvertedCode(cdktf.TerraformStack):
    def __init__(self, scope, name):
        super().__init__(scope, name)
        alicloud_cen_instance_default = alicloud.cen_instance.CenInstance(self, "default",
            cen_instance_name="tf-example"
        )
        data_alicloud_account_default =
        alicloud.data_alicloud_account.DataAlicloudAccount(self, "default_1")
        # This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.
        data_alicloud_account_default.override_logical_id("default")
        data_alicloud_express_connect_physical_connections_default =
        alicloud.data_alicloud_express_connect_physical_connections.DataAlicloudExpressConnectPhysicalConnections(self, "default_2")
        # This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.
        data_alicloud_express_connect_physical_connections_default.override_logical_id("default")
        alicloud_express_connect_virtual_border_router_default =
        alicloud.express_connect_virtual_border_router.ExpressConnectVirtualBorderRouter(self, "default_3",
            detect_multiplier=10,
            local_gateway_ip="10.0.0.1",
            min_rx_interval=1000,
            min_tx_interval=1000,
            peer_gateway_ip="10.0.0.2",
            peering_subnet_mask="255.255.255.252",
            physical_connection_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(
                cdktf.property_access(data_alicloud_express_connect_physical_connections_default.connections, ["0", "id"])),
            vlan_id=1
        )
        # This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.
        alicloud_express_connect_virtual_border_router_default.override_logical_id("default")
        alicloud_express_connect_grant_rule_to_cen_default =
        alicloud.express_connect_grant_rule_to_cen.ExpressConnectGrantRuleToCen(self, "default_4",
            cen_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_cen_instance_default.id),
            cen_owner_id=cdktf.Token.as_number(data_alicloud_account_default.id),
            instance_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_express_connect_virtual_border_router_default.id)
        )
        # This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.
        alicloud_express_connect_grant_rule_to_cen_default.override_logical_id("default")
```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:

* `cen_id` - (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the CEN instance to which you want to grant permissions.
* `cen_owner_id` - (Required, ForceNew) The user ID (UID) of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the CEN instance belongs.
* `instance_id` - (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the VBR.

## Attributes Reference

The following attributes are exported:

* `id` - The resource ID in terraform of Grant Rule To Cen. It formats as `<cen_id>:<cen_owner_id>:<instance_id>`.

### Timeouts

The `timeouts` block allows you to specify [timeouts](https://www.terraform.io/docs/configuration-0-11/resources.html#timeouts) for certain actions:

* `create` - (Defaults to 3 mins) Used when create the Grant Rule To Cen.
* `delete` - (Defaults to 3 mins) Used when delete the Grant Rule To Cen.

## Import

Express Connect Grant Rule To Cen can be imported using the id, e.g.

```shell
$ terraform import alicloud_express_connect_grant_rule_to_cen.example <cen_id>:<cen_owner_id>:<instance_id>
```
